assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: NIIT Limited provides training and development solutions to individuals, corporations, and institutions worldwide. The company offers managed training services, such as custom curriculum design and content development, learning administration and technology, learning delivery, strategic sourcing, and advisory services; and learning and talent development programs in banking, finance and insurance, retail sales enablement, management education, multi-sectoral vocational skills, digital media marketing, and programs in digital transformation technologies. Its brands portfolio comprises the training.com, a learning platform for career programs; Talent Pipeline as a Service, a just-in-time job ready talent for organization; NIIT.tv, a digital learning platform; NIIT international of finance banking and insurance training limited designed for banking, insurance, and financial services; NIIT Imperia, which provides management programs in marketing, sales, finance, operations, HR, law, brand and advertising, international and digital marketing and business, strategy, general management, taxation, and IT areas; and NIIT UNIQUA that offers outsourcing of training solutions for the BPM industry. The company's brands portfolio also includes NIIT NGuru that offers various learning solutions for schools comprising interactive classrooms for teachers, as well as math lab, mobile science labs, IT wizard programs, and learning labs for students; and Practice Plus, a platform for assessment solution of learning, as well as Quick School, an education resource planning solution. In addition, it provides StackRoute, which focuses on creating programmers; and DigiNxt that addresses the opportunities for digital transformation needs of the IT industry. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Gurugram, India.
